interpretation:
The Yellow Heart card is a symbol of pure and innocent love. This card represents a warm and joyful connection between two people, whether it be a romantic relationship or a strong friendship. The color yellow represents happiness, optimism, and positivity, while the heart symbolizes love and affection. This card encourages you to embrace and celebrate the love that you have in your life, whether it is a new relationship or a long-standing friendship. It reminds you to appreciate the warmth and comfort that these relationships bring to your life. 

This card may also represent a new love interest or a deepening of an existing relationship. It is a sign of a strong emotional connection and mutual affection. If you are currently single, this card may be a sign that love is on the horizon for you. If you are in a relationship, this card may indicate a deepening of your connection and a renewed sense of love and passion.

Overall, the Yellow Heart card is a reminder to cherish the love and connections in your life. Embrace the warmth and happiness that they bring and spread joy and positivity wherever you go.
